name: Miniature Things Related - Find Your Baby Toy
details: This is a full-stack and single-page website.This is an e-commerce project. Here, a user can purchase products according to his needs, but he has to sign in or log in with his email.This site is made up of two panels, one admin panel, and the other user panel.
technology: React CSS3 React-router Firebase-Authentication React-bootstrap React-Hook-Form Node.js Express.js MongoDB Heroku React-Spring React-Simple-Snackbar

name: Tourism Related - Travel to places in Bangladesh
details: This project is about Tourism.This site can take you to all the interesting places in Bangladesh.In this project user and admin work together.
technology: React React-router Firebase-Authentication React-Bootstrap React-Hook-Form Node.js Express.js MongoDB

name: Healthcare Related - Diagnostic Laboratory
details: This project is about a diagnostic laboratory. This is a simple web page.Through this site, patients are booked online for various body tests.Some more functional work needs to be done with this web page, I will try that soon.

name: EveryOne Can Draw - Drawspace
details: All courses for learning drawing can be found on this website.Each course is available at a lower price.Courses from beginner level to intermediate level are available here.

name: International singers concert-2021
details: Many twenty musicians will be encouraged through this concert.Many spectators rejoice in this concert.Many child musicians dream of concerts.
